data.name: Fire_Description
data.value: The primordial force of change and destruction, but also warmth and creation. The essence of energy itself. 🜂

data.name: Water_Description
data.value: The source of life, adaptable and fluid. It cleanses, nurtures, and connects all things. 🜄

data.name: Earth_Description
data.value: Solid, stable, and grounding. The foundation of existence, holding all things together. 🜃

data.name: Air_Description
data.value: Light, expansive, and ever-moving. The breath of life, enabling communication and change. 🜁

data.name: Mana_Description
data.value: The raw, unrefined magical energy that permeates all creation. The fuel of the extraordinary.

data.name: Steam_Description
data.value: The heated breath of water, a transitional state between fluid and air. Represents latent power and potential.

data.name: Stone_Description
data.value: Solidified earth, enduring and unyielding. A symbol of permanence and strength.

data.name: Lava_Description
data.value: The molten heart of the earth, a destructive force forged from extreme heat. Potential for creation and ruin.

data.name: Mud_Description
data.value: A humble mixture of earth and water, fertile and teeming with potential. From nothing, life can begin.

data.name: ConcentratedMana_Description
data.value: Mana refined to its purest form, crackling with power. Handle with extreme caution, lest it consume you.

data.name: FreezingVapour_Description
data.value: A volatile cloud, colder than the deepest winter. It crystallizes all it touches, destroying organic matter.

data.name: Iron_Description
data.value: Ferrum (♂) the blood of the earth, the backbone of modern civilization. Forged into all tools and weapons.

data.name: Copper_Description
data.value: The red metal (Cuprum), known for its conductivity and malleability. A conduit for energy and a symbol of Venus (♀).

data.name: Gold_Description
data.value: Aurum (☉) the sun's reflection on earth, the most perfect and honorable metal. Represents wealth, power and spiritual enlightenment.

data.name: Lead_Description
data.value: Heavy, dense - Plumbum. In alchemy linked to Saturn (♄), a symbol of restriction and the initial stage of alchemical transformation.

data.name: Tin_Description
data.value: Bright, silvery metal (Stannum). In alchemy is associated with Jupiter (♃) and luck, in philosophy means "breath of life".

data.name: Zinc_Description
data.value: A resilient, bluish-white metal, known for its protective properties. In alchemy is known by the preparation of "Philosophic wool" by burning zinc in air, which was called "nix alba" (white snow)

data.name: Silver_Description
data.value: The moon's mirror (☽), reflecting purity and intuition - Argentum (🜛). A symbol of feminine energy and emotional balance.

data.name: Sulfur_Description
data.value: (🜍) Considered the father of all metals. Has the «principle of combustible and the soul», organic and flying. Embodiment of passion and masculinity.

data.name: Mercury_Description
data.value: Hydrargyrum (☿) fluid and elusive. Messenger of the gods, symbolizing communication, adaptability, union of masculinity and feminine. In alchemy embodies the «principle of metal and the spirit» and is used to separate soul from metals and its carrier.

data.name: Salt_Description
data.value: (🜔) a reflection of feminine, the «principle of fixity and the body». Associated with paradox (bitterness), deep mind and finding immortality (preservative).

data.name: Bismuth_Description
data.value: A brittle, crystalline metal. Known for its iridescent surface, it represents beauty and transformation.

data.name: Quartz_Description
data.value: Crystallized earth, pure and clear. It is said to amplify the magical energies and focus the mind. Often served as a basis for alchemists lanterns, sticks and amulets.

data.name: Sand_Description
data.value: Most of the earth's rocks, including sand - silica. Tiny grains of Earth, component of many rituals.

data.name: LivelyConcoction_Description
data.value: A strange mixture of organic and inorganic matter in liquid form.

data.name: Alcohol_Description
data.value: The spirit extracted (🜉), a volatile essence. Can both liberate and destroy, revealing hidden truths.

data.name: Gunpowder_Description
data.value: A volatile concoction of fire, earth, and air, capable of immense destructive power. Use with extreme caution.

data.name: Poison_Description
data.value: A subtle and insidious substance born of decay and malice. It corrupts the body and weakens the spirit.

data.name: Slime_Description
data.value: Viscous, often rotting substance. Symbolizes disintegration, conversion and potential for new life.

data.name: Honey_Description
data.value: The golden nectar of the bee, a sweet elixir of life and a potent preservative. It holds the secrets of the hive and the essence of a thousand flowers.

data.name: Diamond_Description
data.value: The purest form of carbon, unyielding and brilliant. A symbol of invincibility, enlightenment, and eternal beauty.

data.name: Ruby_Description
data.value: A crimson gemstone, infused with the fire of passion and courage. Promotes vitality and strength.

data.name: Sapphire_Description
data.value: A celestial gemstone, reflecting wisdom and truth. Inspires clarity, focus, and spiritual insight.

data.name: Citrine_Description
data.value: A sun-kissed gem radiating warmth and abundance. It attracts prosperity, amplifies personal power, and kindles the inner flame.

data.name: Emerald_Description
data.value: A verdant stone of rebirth and growth, echoing the life force of the natural world. It heals the spirit and fosters harmony.

data.name: Amethyst_Description
data.value: A violet gem of tranquility and insight, warding off negative energies and sharpening the mind's eye. A stone for contemplation.

data.name: Aquamarine_Description
data.value: A sea-blue jewel of courage and protection, calming turbulent emotions and ensuring safe passage. The ocean's blessing.

data.name: MasterEmerald_Description
data.value: is a massive green emerald, a mystical relic of immeasurable power from the forgotten past. It acts as a counterweight to the Emerald Chaos, can nullify or control them.

data.name: Alkahest_Description
data.value: A substance that is the universal solvent of everything. The ultimate tool of transformation to produce a philosopher's stone.

data.name: Brass_Description
data.value: A bright, gold-like alloy of copper and zinc. Represents resilience, creativity, and balance.

data.name: Bronze_Description
data.value: An enduring alloy of Copper and Tin, famed for its strength and corrosion resistance. A metal of heroes and greatful legacies.

data.name: Calomel_Description
data.value: The heavy, white mineral mercury chloride. Used by alchemists for purification and cure, although is very toxic in excess.

data.name: Cinnabar_Description
data.value: A brilliant red ore of Mercury Sulfide. The source of the mercury - symbol of transformation, but also a deadly poison.

data.name: Urine_Description
data.value: A humble waste product, yet containing the seeds of new life. A source of alchemical secrets and potential transformations.

data.name: Blood_Description
data.value: The river of life, a concentration of magic in the human body. It carries within itself the essence of the individual, associated with heat and fire, as well as cruelty and anger.

data.name: Meat_Description
data.value: Flesh, the building block of living beings. Source of primary power and earthly content. Eternal reminder of mortality.

data.name: Bones_Description
data.value: The framework of bodies, strong and enduring.

data.name: BurntLime_Description
data.value: The excension of the earth can be calm as a monumental mountain or active and impulsive, revealing its hidden power.

data.name: Pyrite_Description
data.value: Fool's Gold, a glittering mineral that deceives the eye. A reminder that not all that glitters is true gold, a lesson in discernment.

data.name: OilOfVitriol_Description
data.value: Also known as sulfuric acid, which is one of the strongest acids.

data.name: Ambrosia_Description
data.value: The food of the gods, granting immortality and eternal youth. A symbol of divine grace and ultimate reward.

data.name: Nigredo_Description
data.value: The blackening, the first stage of the alchemical Great Work. Represents decomposition, purification, and confronting one's shadow.

data.name: Albedo_Description
data.value: The whitening, the second stage of the alchemical Great Work. Symbolizes purification, cleansing, and the emergence of clarity.

data.name: Citrinitas_Description
data.value: The yellowing, the third stage of the alchemical Great Work. Represents the dawning of solar consciousness, intuition, and self-discovery.

data.name: Rubedo_Description
data.value: The reddening, the final stage of the alchemical Great Work. Represents the union of spirit and matter, achieving spiritual wholeness, and illumination.

data.name: PhilosophersStone_Description
data.value: The ultimate goal of alchemy, a substance capable of transmuting base metals into gold and granting immortality. The key to all secrets.

data.name: HighRiskLevel
data.value: The risk level has reached a critical mark!

data.name: Defeat
data.value: Defeat. You are a unfortunate alchemist

data.name: YouMayGet
data.value: You may mix something to get

data.name: RulesThemselves
data.value: 0. You are an amateur alchemist, eager to improve your skills and understand the alchemical truth.?1. Your current goal is to get the purposed substance (its recipe).?2. Mix two components to get new substances (later you can mix three).?3. When mixing, you must take into account the substance's properties and external factors.?4. Don't forget about precautions - you are still an amateur!?5. If you break them, you will lose part of your reputation and increase "RL" (Risk Level).?6. Environment in different modes are similar, but due to restrictions you will have to act differently.? Good luck and exciting alchemy!?

data.name: FamiliarRecipe
data.value: This recipe seems familiar to you.

data.name: FoundAuxilary
data.value: You have notice some substances nearby

data.name: YouAlreadyHaveProgressDownload
data.value: You already seem to have progress. Download?

data.name: YouVeJustInvented
data.value: You've just invented a way to fail the quest

data.name: AreYouFool
data.value: Are you a fool to create this?! Congratulations, you combined incompatible

data.name: ItsExperimentalApproach
data.value: It's not a mistake, it's... an experimental approach!

data.name: ShowedHowNotToDo
data.value: Congratulations! You just showed "How not to do"

data.name: Temperature_Positive
data.value: [+] Keeps temperature better than a thermos

data.name: Temperature_Negative
data.value: [-] Temperature changes like a cat's mood

data.name: Hardness_Positive
data.value: [+] Hard as this game developer's nerves

data.name: Volatility_Negative
data.value: [-] Evaporates faster than patience in a long queue

data.name: Toxicity_Negative
data.value: [-] Toxicity off the charts - like random chat toxicity

data.name: Flammability_Positive
data.value: [+] Fireproof enough to impress a dragon

data.name: Flammability_Negative
data.value: [-] Ignites faster than a tavern argument

data.name: Explosiveness_Negative
data.value: [-] Ready to blow louder than New Year's firecrackers

data.name: Radioactivity_Positive
data.value: [+] Safer than a freshman's magic textbook
